help-file.title: "PSYCHIC CRUSH" "IMPROVED PSYCHIC CRUSH"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Generic
"Psychic Crush" viciously and directly attacks the victim's physical as well as his metaphysical mind. The combined attacks result in severe damage and other unfortunate aftereffects. A psionicist specializing as an enslaver will upon the attack try to penetrate the inner defenses of the mind and deliver yet another crippling attack.
